meanings.definition: Not relating to words or language.
meanings.sent1: The nonlexical symbols in the artwork conveyed emotions without using words.
meanings.sent2: The nonlexical gestures of the mime artist were captivating.
meanings.sent3: The nonlexical dance performance left the audience speechless.
meanings.sent4: Her nonlexical painting spoke volumes about her inner thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The nonlexical music evoked strong feelings in the listeners.

meanings.definition: Not part of the vocabulary or lexicon.
meanings.sent1: The secret code had a nonlexical meaning known only to a few.
meanings.sent2: The ancient script contained nonlexical characters that puzzled historians.
meanings.sent3: The nonlexical symbols on the map led to hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: His nonlexical hand signals were a unique form of communication.
meanings.sent5: The nonlexical markings on the artifact revealed its age.
